summary: Recolor of the akaviri katana inspired by agni and rudra from dmc
descriptionHtml:
Replaces akaviri katana (blades katana)

inspired by agni and rudra from dmc

Please read*********************************
I now have a mod which replaces the elven sword ingame with the katana
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2249
Thank you!**************************************

Installation: drop into your data folder: D:\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Please don\'t forget to leave a comment and an endorsement if you like!

Any questions or problems please notify me right away!

Please feel free to submit your own pictures for this or any of my other submissions!

**************************************************************
If you like and download please endorse!
Constructive criticism is appreciated!
**************************************************************
author: kirkieball
